description: Contraction produces reduced tensor; δ acts on the reduced object.

effect.index\_behavior: Σ produces a tensor with fewer indices; δ acts on this new index set.
effect.null\_mode\_behavior: If δ preserves null modes, Σ and δ commute up to NF\_SIGMA\_DELTA.

commutativity: When δ is linear and index-preserving, Σ ∘ δ ≈ δ ∘ Σ (mod NF\_SIGMA\_DELTA).
